description: Fetch historical news from the archive (7+ years) with date range filtering and rich search options

inputs.name: q
inputs.description: Keyword or phrase to search for in articles

inputs.name: countries
inputs.description: ISO 2-letter country codes (up to 5). Can be comma-separated string or array

inputs.name: regions
inputs.description: AI-classified regions (up to 5). Can be comma-separated string or array

inputs.name: categories
inputs.description: News categories to include (up to 5). Can be comma-separated string or array

inputs.name: exclude_categories
inputs.description: News categories to exclude (up to 5). Can be comma-separated string or array

inputs.name: languages
inputs.description: Language codes (up to 5). Can be comma-separated string or array

inputs.name: domains
inputs.description: Source domains to include (up to 5). Can be comma-separated string or array

inputs.name: exclude_domains
inputs.description: Domains to exclude. Can be comma-separated string or array

inputs.name: exclude_fields
inputs.description: Fields to exclude from response. Can be comma-separated string or array

inputs.name: size
inputs.description: Number of articles per request (10 for free, 50 for paid plans)

outputs.name: articles
outputs.description: Array of article objects with metadata

outputs.name: next_page
outputs.description: Token for pagination to get next page of results
